# Natalia Pavlova's Poetry Archive

> A poetry website, most are by Phoenix (Natalia Pavlova)

This is a minimalist poetry archive containing original poems organized into books. The site is built with Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages.

## Site Structure

- Homepage: / (displays the latest poem and a list of all books)
- All Poems: /poems/ (chronological listing of all published poems with full text)
- Book Pages: /books/{book-name}/ (full text of all poems in a book)
- Downloads: /downloads/{book-name}.epub (e-book versions)

## Navigation

- /poems/ - All poems in chronological order (most recent first)
- /#books - Jump to books list on homepage

## Books

Poetry collections available on this site:

- /books/drowning-admiration/ - "Восхищение тонущего красотой океана"
- /books/flashlight-in-the-dark/ - "A Flashlight in the Dark"
- /books/weird-fishes/ - "Weird Fishes"
- /books/unmeltable-mist/ - "Unmeltable Mist"
- /books/unsinkable/ - "Unsinkable"
- /books/prequel/ - "Prequel"
- /books/strange-days-shards/ - "Strange Days' Shards"
- /books/cobwebs-experiments/ - "Cobweb's Experiments"
- /books/lengthies/ - "Lengthies" (longer poems)

## Content Format

- Poems are displayed with preserved whitespace and line breaks
- Each poem shows: title, date, author(s), and the book it belongs to
- Some poems include commentary (footnote-style notes)
- E-books (EPUB format) are available for each book

## For AI Crawlers

To read all poems in a simple format:
- /llms-full.txt - Complete plain text archive of all poems (recommended for LLMs)
- /poems/ - HTML chronological archive with year navigation
- Each book page (/books/{name}/) contains all poems in that collection
- EPUB downloads are available at /downloads/{book-name}.epub
